chapter.title: OpenIDM Compatibility
chapter.para: This chapter covers major and minor changes to existing functionality, as well as deprecated and removed functionality in this release of OpenIDM. You must read this chapter before commencing a migration from a previous OpenIDM release.

section.title: Major Changes to Existing Functionality
section.para: The following changes will have an impact on existing deployments. Read these changes carefully and adjust existing scripts and clients accordingly.

varlistentry.term: Changes to indexing for JDBC repositories

listitem.para: To improve indexing across the various supported JDBC repositories, a change has been made for all generic object mappings. The size of the propvalue column in the objectproperties tables (used for searches) is now limited to 2000 characters for all repositories other than MS SQL. Longer values are truncated. For MS SQL repositories, the propvalue column is restricted to 195 characters.
Incoming searches are trimmed accordingly, so that search filters such as equals do not break for the truncated column values.

section.title: Minor Changes to Existing Functionality
section.para: The following changes should not have an impact on existing deployment configurations.

varlistentry.term: Change to roles assignment operation scripts

listitem.para: The scripts that specify how role values are assigned (replaceTarget.js and mergeWithTarget.js) now pass back a map containing the new value for the target object field and, optionally, an updated attributesInfo object. Previously, these scripts simply returned the new value of the target object field.

The way in which you generate connector configurations for access to external resources has changed. There are now three separate actions involved in creating the connector configuration. For more information, see Creating Default Connector Configurations in the Integrator's Guide.
The previous method of creating a connector configuration is retained in this release, for compatibility.

varlistentry.term: New location for sample JDBC repository configurations

listitem.para: The sample JDBC repository configurations, previously located at openidm/samples/misc/repo.jdbc-repo-type.json, are now located at openidm/db/repo-type/conf/repo.jdbc.json. The files no longer need to be renamed before being copied to your project's conf directory.

section.title: Deprecated Functionality
section.para: The following functionality has been deprecated in OpenIDM ${docTargetVersion}, and is likely to be removed in a future release.

listitem.para: When Configuring Connectors, you can set up nativeType property level extensions. The JAVA_TYPE_DATE extension is deprecated.

section.para: No additional functionality is deprecated at this time.

section.title: Removed Functionality
section.para: No functionality has been removed in OpenIDM ${docTargetVersion}.
No functionality has been removed at this time.

section.title: Functionality That Will Change in the Future
section.para: No major functionality is planned to change at this time.
